price: Jesus said, “I am a slave of Allah. He has given me the Scripture and made me a prophet.
arabic: قَالَ إِنِّي عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ ءَاتَىٰنِيَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلَنِي نَبِيّٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
